alert.note: Alert for Crittenden; Union (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 20 at 10:16AM EST until February 25 at 8:31AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Paducah KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kentucky...Illinois... Ohio River at Shawneetown. .Recent heavy rain has caused the Ohio River to rise. It is forecast to reach flood stage at Shawneetown late Tuesday evening, on its way to a crest of 33.8 feet Thursday morning. For the Ohio River...including Shawneetown...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING TO SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at Shawneetown. * WHEN...From Tuesday evening to Saturday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM CST Monday the stage was 31.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow evening to a crest of 33.8 feet Thursday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 33.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
